| **Regulatory Alignment** | `PRA SS1/21 / FCA PS21/3 / Other` |

| Attribute | Value |

| **Impact Tolerance** | `[Defined tolerance from IBS]` |
| **Expected Behaviour** | `[How the system should respond]` |

## 3. Demonstration Execution

### 3.1 Pre-Condition State

A snapshot of the system state immediately before the failure was induced.

| Component | Status | Health Check Hash |
|-----------|--------|-------------------|
| `[Component A]` | `HEALTHY` | `[SHA-256 Hash]` |
| `[Component B]` | `HEALTHY` | `[SHA-256 Hash]` |
| ... | ... | ... |

### 3.2 Failure Injection Log

| Timestamp | Action | Target Component | Result |
|-----------|--------|------------------|--------|
| `[T+0s]` | `Inject Failure` | `[Component X]` | `Failure Induced` |
| `[T+Ns]` | `[System Response]` | `[Component Y]` | `[Outcome]` |
| ... | ... | ... | ... |

### 3.3 Post-Condition State

A snapshot of the system state after the failure was resolved or the test concluded.

| Component | Status | Health Check Hash |
|-----------|--------|-------------------|
| `[Component A]` | `HEALTHY` | `[SHA-256 Hash]` |
| `[Component X]` | `RECOVERED` | `[SHA-256 Hash]` |
| ... | ... | ... |

## 4. Outcome Assessment

| Metric | Tolerance | Actual | Verdict |
|--------|-----------|--------|---------|
| **Time to Detect** | `< X seconds` | `[Actual Value]` | `PASS / FAIL` |
| **Time to Respond** | `< Y seconds` | `[Actual Value]` | `PASS / FAIL` |
| **Time to Recover** | `< Z seconds` | `[Actual Value]` | `PASS / FAIL` |
| **Data Integrity** | `100%` | `[Actual Value]` | `PASS / FAIL` |
| **Customer Impact** | `None` | `[Actual Value]` | `PASS / FAIL` |

**Overall Verdict:** `WITHIN TOLERANCE / OUTSIDE TOLERANCE`

## 5. Cryptographic Attestation

| Field | Value |
|-------|-------|
| **Demonstration Hash** | `[SHA-256 hash of this evidence document]` |
| **Previous Evidence Hash** | `[Hash of preceding evidence in chain]` |
| **Chain Position** | `[N of M]` |
| **Attestation Timestamp** | `[UTC Timestamp]` |

---

## 6. Verification Instructions

To independently verify this evidence:

1.  **Verify Pre-Condition Hashes:** Recalculate the health check hashes for each component in Section 3.1.
2.  **Verify Failure Injection Log:** Confirm the sequence and timestamps of actions in Section 3.2 against the raw system logs (available upon request).
3.  **Verify Post-Condition Hashes:** Recalculate the health check hashes for each component in Section 3.3.
4.  **Verify Document Integrity:** Recalculate the SHA-256 hash of this entire document (excluding the `Demonstration Hash` field) and compare to the `Demonstration Hash` in Section 5.

---

## 7. Disclaimer

> This document is generated by the Shadow Assurance Layer for internal assurance and regulatory evidence purposes only. It **demonstrates** system behaviour under an induced failure condition. It does not **guarantee** or **warrant** that the system will behave identically in a real-world failure scenario. This document should not be distributed outside the organisation without explicit authorisation.
